post.author: MediaDigm
post.content:
Hello,

As a startup company (Toronto), MediaDigm Technology Inc. is looking for an intermediate software engineer. The candidate for the position should have the following skill set.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

FULLTIME POSITION: Intermediate Software Engineer (Developer)

RESPONSIBILITIES:

-Software development/design/test

SKILLS:

- Experience in network programming (TCP, UCP, socket ...)
- Experience in system programming to resolve any issue regarding system attributes (reliability, availability, performance based on multi-threads).
- Experience programming in Java with OOA/D/P (UML)
- Experience with java GUI programming
- Experience of Web application development (jsp, servlet...)
- Exposure to J2EE (WebLogic, JBoss)
- Thinking creatively and positively
- Structured analysis capability
- Good team player

ASSETS:

- Experience or Knowledge of H.323 and T.120 protocol stacks
- Experience of java programming with JMF
- Experience or Knowledge of telco (or various network types)
- Experience with C++ programming

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

If you are interested in the position, could you send me your resume to

gson@mediadigm.net.

Thanks.
post.title: A position available for intermediate software engineer(developer)
